name: Konvik

active_effects.name: Mental Mastery
active_effects.description: Mastery of mental techniques increases effectiveness and range.

active_effects.name: Telepathic Link
active_effects.description: Natural telepathic abilities enhance communication and coordination.

appearance_summary: Konvik is a slender Yamanaka with bright, expressive eyes and blonde hair that often falls into his face. He moves with quiet grace and carries himself with an air of calm intelligence. His presence is often felt before he's seen, and he has a natural ability to put others at ease.
backstory_summary: Born into the Yamanaka clan, Konvik displayed exceptional talent for mental techniques and telepathy from an early age. He excelled in intelligence gathering and became a key member of Konoha's Intelligence Division. His ability to read minds and transfer consciousness has made him invaluable for both combat and intelligence operations.
personality_summary: Konvik is an empathetic and intelligent shinobi who specializes in mental techniques and communication. He approaches situations with understanding and patience, using his telepathic abilities to gather information and coordinate with allies. His natural empathy makes him excellent at reading people and situations.
combat_directives: Use mind transfer to gather intelligence and control opponents. Use telepathy to coordinate with allies and communicate silently. Use mental techniques to disorient and confuse enemies. Prioritize information gathering and team coordination. Maintain mental barriers to protect against enemy mental attacks.
